article_title: Bernard Schoenburg: Veterans advocate Tom Banning may run for Congress in 13th

article_metadata.description: An assistant Illinois attorney general who works as an advocate for veterans is considering a run as a Democrat in the 13th Congressional District, where Republican Rep. RODNEY DAVIS of Taylorville is the incumbent.TOM BANNING, 47, of Glen Carbon said he's been encouraged to run by family, friends and Democrats — including the Democratic Congressional Campaign Committee.Banning said he's new to politics, but the problems facing veterans are key reasons people want him to run."I see areas
article_metadata.author: Bernard Schoenburg, Political Writer
